subNodes.conversationText: root
Oh my, what a pleasent surprise.  It has been years since we have had visitors.  How did you get here?
We came through the caves...who are you?
My name is Sivel and we have been here for over sixty years.
My name is <FirstName>.  May we ask you a few questions?
Well of course, ask away.
How did you get here?
We came here during the Great Escape from Charnia and surrounding areas.
We were part of the Last Stand against Zorn's followers.
We managed to survive and during the final retreat we decided to stay here, in this valley, while the others collapsed the caves.
We have lived here in peace ever since then.
May we ask another question?
What do you know about the remaining passage through the mountain?
There is a cave entrance near the cave exit you came through.
Those caves lead to the Dwarven Mines and eventually the Great Dwarven Cavern.
That pass is now controlled by a large group of undead led by a vampire couple.
The path of course will eventually lead to the Eastern Lands.
May we ask another question?
You said you had visitors years ago, can you tell us about them?
Oh yes, there was a caravan, led by Adwen, that passed through here about 10 years ago.
That was my father.  Can you tell us where they went from here?
They took the cave passage near our little village, but the passage is no longer any good.
Why not?
There is a young red dragon that has recently settled in and now calls the caves his home.
Has he attacked your village?
Oh no, he hasn't shown any interest in our village, as of yet.
He has an entrance through the ceiling of his lair.
The cave entrance near our village is much too small for him to use.
May we ask another question?
Do you think my father's caravan made it through to the Eastern Lands?|***gc_journal_entry-->NOT::False    String::fathers_caravan    String::20    |
Oh yes, that passage would have safely taken them to the Eastern Lands.
May we ask another question?
Would you like us to remove this dragon for you?|***gc_journal_entry-->NOT::False    String::fathers_caravan    String::20    |
That would be wonderful.  I'm sure it is just a matter of time before he will show interest in our little village.
May we ask another question?
How did my father make it this far if the cave passage was collapsed?|***gc_journal_entry-->NOT::False    String::fathers_caravan    String::20    |
There are other ways to get here from the Western Lands.  Of course, the caves are the easiest way now that the path is open and safe.
May we ask another question?
Actually, I think we should keep moving.
Yes, of course.  Good luck on your journey.
Thank you.
Good <quarterday> <FirstName>, how may I help you?
We were able to defeat the dragon for you.  You need not worry about that threat anymore.|***gc_journal_entry-->NOT::False    String::red_dragon    String::20    |
Thank you so much.  May Elos guide you in you journeys and I hope you are able to find your father.|***ga_give_xp-->Int::1200    Int::1    |
You're welcome.
Hello Sivel, may we ask you a few more questions?
Well of course, ask away.

We came here during the Great Escape from Charnia and surrounding areas.
